casebody.data:
STATE v. BOGLE. No. COA03-1574. North Carolina Court of Appeals. Filed April 5, 2005. Certification Date April 25, 2005. Appeal from Gaston (96CRS39392, 98CRS13944, 98CRS13945, 98CRS13946, 98CRS13947, 98CRS13948).

Case reported without published opinion. Affirmed as to second degree murder; remanded for new sentencing hearing on the remaining charges.
